Detailed Description

A more specialized visitor version of brics_3d::rsg::PointCloudAccumulator to be used in conjunction with a SceneGraphFacade.

The visitor is essentially the same as brics_3d::rsg::PointCloudAccumulator except that it uses an ID do define the referene node.

)

Constructor with reference node defined be ID and not by (shared) pointer.

Parameters:
facadeHandleHande to the scene graph facade as it manages the IDs.
referenceNodeIdThe Cartesian frame that is valid for the node will be used as reference to interpret the 3D points.
